detail_desc: Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, chest pockets, and patch front pockets with a button. Covered elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned crêpe weave with buttons down the front and an opening at the hem. Unlined.
LIMITED EDITION. Flared, softly draping, calf-length pleated skirt in an airy, patterned weave with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Unlined.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted body in soft, ribbed jersey. Straight cut and a double layer at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and a concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Set with two hair clips, a hair grip, a ring and a necklace with appliqués. Hair clips with plastic beads. Hair grip with sparkly stones. Adjustable ring with a faceted decoration. Narrow metal chain necklace with star-shaped pendants and an adjustable length 40.5-46 cm.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, flounce at the top and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.

Biker jacket in washed denim with an off-centre zip, press-studs on the lapels, and shoulder tabs with a press-stud. Welt side pockets, one zipped front pocket, one small flap front pocket with a press-stud, and a zipped sleeve pocket. Belt loops at the front with a press-stud, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with jersey-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. No fasteners.
V-neck top in woven fabric with short, flounced sleeves.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Soft cotton jersey leggings in different designs with an elasticated waist.
Off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

LIMITED EDITION. Wide dress in lace made from a cotton blend with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with flared cuffs. Straight cut with a seam at the waist and gentle gathers at the bottom for width and drape. V-neck underdress in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps and slits in the sides.
Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sandals with narrow straps and a round buckle over the foot, and long straps that tie around the ankles. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 5 cm.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with a fold-down shaft that has a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side and back pockets and straight legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and sewn-in creases.
Jacket in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Padded jacket with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers in printed stretch fabric with imitation leather details and a soft, stretchy edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing at the front, a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Nylon hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles that are made partly from recycled polyester. Rubber soles.
Trousers woven in an airy wool and linen weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim legs.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft double knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Treggings in stretch jersey with a washed denim look. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and short sleeves. Unlined.
Lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Cotton cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
Pattern-knit jumper in a wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a gently rounded hem.

Shaping shortie briefs in jersey with a firm sculpting effect on the waist. High waist, lined gusset and full coverage at the back. The briefs are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tube scarf in a soft knit with a small appliqué at the hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Lace thong briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides with decorative straps, and a string back.
Short, wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hoop earrings with a plastic bead. Length 3.5 cm.
Short dress in jersey crêpe with lace insets, a round neckline and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and a bell-shaped skirt.
Long, straight-cut shirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets with a pleat, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section at the front, a mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem with embossed text. Medium support. The polyester content of the bra is recycled.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top that is slightly longer at the back. 3/4-length leggings with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with an all-over print, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Popover running jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Stand-up collar, zip at the top, a partially loose yoke at the back and a chest pocket with a concealed zip. Seam at the waist, zipped side pockets, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a rounded hem with elastication at the back. Slightly longer at the back. Partly lined in mesh. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Metal watch with a narrow adjustable strap with a metal buckle. Width of strap 1.5 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.5 cm.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly with a button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Car coat in woven fabric with a water-repellent finish. Collar, press-studs down the front and diagonal welt front pockets. Ventilating holes with eyelets under the arms, long sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Unlined with taped seams inside. The coat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline, two layers of flounces down the front that continue back over the shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved blouse in silk crêpe with a smocked stand-up collar, a small opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, a gathered yoke at the back and smocked cuffs.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in crinkled jersey with elastication and a flounce at the top and short sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and an elasticated waist. Lined.
Suede ankle boots with elastication at the front, a loop at the back, pointed toes and covered heels. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric. Extended waistband with a concealed button, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Short, flared top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a trim around the arm openings.
Knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Deep neckline with decorative gathers at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Tiered skirt for added width. Unlined.
Boxy-style sports top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Hood with an elastic drawstring, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a high elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in softly draping, ribbed jersey with a sheen. Narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck at the front and a lace trim at the top.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 5.5 cm.
Hat in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery and a ribbed hem.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in stretch denim with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with patch pockets. Unlined.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Jumper in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool with a flounce over the shoulders, buttons at the back of the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button (press-stud for sizes 2-8Y). Regular fit.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
